name: Rocket Box Alpha 0.5
description:
Rocket box is a single player game that will be released on Android and IOS, You take control of kid genius who is slowing building up his rocket powered cardboard box as he tries to get 2km across town to his friends house.

Features

-Realistic Physics.

-Highly addictive game play that will keep you coming back to progress.

-Over 100 upgrades for the rocket with 5 different unique areas.

-Phone accelerometer control

-Achievements 

future development & updates

Environment, IAP, additional art and polish
